original_text: “Then the man who had received one bag of gold came. ‘Master,’ he said, ‘I knew that you are a hard man, harvesting where you have not sown and gathering where you have not scattered seed.
korean_text: 한 달란트 받았던 자는 와서 이르되 주인이여 당신은 굳은 사람이라 심지 않은 데서 거두고 헤치지 않은 데서 모으는 줄을 내가 알았으므로

sentences.original_text: Then the man who had received one bag of gold came
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 한 봉지의 금을 받았던 그 사람이 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: I knew that you are a hard man
harvesting where you have not sown
and gathering where you have not scattered seed
sentences.korean_translation: 씨를 뿌리지 않은 곳에서 모으시는 분이신 것을
